name: RogueTech
description: Please download the mod installer from https://www.nexusmods.com/battletech/mods/79 before proceeding. Unfortunately, since Nexus requires a login, this cannot be fetched automatically

files.battletech-prefix: N/A:Please select the prefix into which BATTLETECH is installed

task.description: Please follow the menu options to configure and install RogueTech
task.name: wineexec

content:
files:
- rt-installer: N/A:Please select the RogueTech installer
- battletech-prefix: N/A:Please select the prefix into which BATTLETECH is installed
game:
  args: -force-opengl
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/BATTLETECH/BattleTech.exe
  prefix: battletech-prefix
installer:
- task:
    description: Please follow the menu options to configure and install RogueTech
    executable: rt-installer
    name: wineexec
    prefix: battletech-prefix
requires: battletech
